subject: From: JP Morgan Chase Bank New
body:
From: JP Morgan Chase Bank New York.
#455 Broadway New York, NY, 10227 USA.
Dear Customer: Chase Bank HeadQuarter realized your funds back so that you won't lose such an amount of funds. I did according to the instructions given to me.
Your ATM Card Funds is $2.5Million United States Dollars is still available for claim and 
am giving you from this moment till next week to raise the fee so that your transaction will be finalized without delay.
Reconfirm your full details.
Your  Full Name:
Your Home Address:
Your Phone Number:
Your WhatsApp Number:
Your Occupation:
Your Country:
Your copy ID
:
Your Age:
The fee we needed is $50.00 USD send the fee by Steam Wallet Card or Apple iTunes Gift Card.
I wait for the picture of the gift card.
Thank You For Banking With Us.
Mr. Robert Justin
CEO Manager Chase Bank

subject: Re: From: JP Morgan Chase Bank New
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me about my ATM card funds. I appreciate the information you provided. Can you please tell me more about the process of claiming the funds and why a Steam Wallet Card or Apple Gift Card is needed for the fee payment? I want to make sure I understand everything clearly before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Willie

subject: Re: From: JP Morgan Chase Bank New
body:
Your ATM card $2.5 Million USD is available now, so send the fee $50
through Apple iTunes Card or steam wallet gift card, Bitcoin wallet
address, and your ATM card will be delivered to your house address okay.

subject: Re: From: JP Morgan Chase Bank New
body:
Hello! That sounds interesting. Can you tell me more about how I can send the fee through Apple Card or Steam wallet gift card?

Best wishes,
Willie

subject: Re: From: JP Morgan Chase Bank New
body:
Hello

You can purchase the Apple iTunes Card or steam wallet gift card in Walmart
store or any Apple store, or if you can be able to send the fee through
Bitcoin, then i will give you my Bitcoin wallet address to send the $50
okay.

subject: Re: From: JP Morgan Chase Bank New
body:
Hello! That's interesting, I didn't know you could purchase those cards at Walmart or Apple stores. How does the Bitcoin payment work exactly?

Best wishes,
Willie

subject: Re: From: JP Morgan Chase Bank New
body:
I will advise you to purchase Apple iTunes Card or steam wallet gift card
ok, and receive your ATM card, again reconfirm your address.

subject: Re: From: JP Morgan Chase Bank New
body:
Hello! Thank you for the information. Can you tell me more about how purchasing an Apple Card or Steam Wallet gift card is related to receiving my ATM card? I'm curious to learn more about this process.

Best wishes,
Willie

subject: Re: From: JP Morgan Chase Bank New
body: Go to Walmart and purchase the gift card.

subject: Re: From: JP Morgan Chase Bank New
body:
Hello! Thank you for the suggestion. Can you please provide more details about why I should purchase a gift card from Walmart?

Best wishes,
Willie
